div.p: (hand 2) On the 16th day before the Kalends of September. (hand 1) In the consulship of our masters Valerius Licinnianus Licinnius Augustus and Flavius Valerius Constantinus the son of the Augusti. To Aurelius Dioskourides alias Iulianos, the strategos of the Oxyrhynchite nome, from the Jewish community of the splendid and most splendid city of Oxyrhynchos through Aurelii [â€¦] Translation: C. Balamoshev, JJP 47 (2017) 32-33
